title: Feel feet on floor
content: Focus all of your attention on your feet. Feel the floor under them.

title: Texture of a Pebble
content: Focus all of your attention on the feel of a pebble or coin in your hand.

title: Breathing
content: Sit quietly and focus all of your attention on your in-breath and then your out-breath.

title: The space around you – Colors
content: Look around and focus your attention on the colors around you, noticing as many colors as you can.

title: The space around you – Smells
content: Focus all of your attention on the smells in your environment.

title: The space around you – Sounds
content: Focus on and listen carefully to the many sounds in your environment.

title: The space around you – Temperature
content: Focus all of your attention of the temperature of the air on your skin.

title: Eating
content: While you are eating, focus all of your attention on the sensations of the food in your mouth while you chew very slowly.

title: Brushing your teeth
content: Brush your teeth and focus your attention on all of the sensations, tastes, and smells of this activity.

title: Walking
content: Walk slowly, focusing your attention on what it feels like to take each step.

title: Object
content: Pick up any small object off the ground and focus all of your attention on the texture of the object and the feel of it in your hand.

title: Pet an animal
content: Pet an animal that is quiet and calm. Focus all of your attention on the sensations on your hand.

title: Attach yourself to the earth
content: With your feet shoulder width apart, close your eyes and imagine that you are growing roots into the earth, making you strong and stable.

title: Ice cube
content: Grab an ice cube and focus all of your attention on the sensations that go with it, cold, wet, and tingling.

title: Name what you see
content: Look around you and name what you see. Start with large objects, then move to smaller and smaller objects.

title: Focus on touch
content: Rub your hands together, clap your hands. Focus all of your attention on the feelings and sounds that you experience.

title: Reorientation
content: Remind yourself where you are, what today's date is, when were you born, and what you did yesterday.

title: Call a friend
content: Call a friend and discuss some activity you did together recently.

title: Past success
content: Remember what you did to successfully get past a previous painful experience.

title: Baby steps
content: Ask yourself and answer: What would be a small sign that things are getting a little better?

title: Suck on a peppermint
content: Slowly suck on a mint and describe the taste and your reaction in detail to yourself.

title: Stamp your feet on the ground
content: Stamp your feet on the ground. Feel the force. Hear the sounds. Notice.

title: Feel your clothes on your skin
content: Pay attention to the sensation of your clothes touching your skin.

title: Feel your hands
content: Put your hands together and notice the sensations of the skin-on-skin contact.

title: Hear Others
content: Tune into the voices of others around you. Only pay attention to the sounds of others’ voices.
